titles.title: Homeless Assistance Act of 2019
Homeless Assistance Act of 2019
To authorize public housing agencies to share certain data regarding homeless individuals and families for the provision of housing and services, and for other purposes.
Homeless Assistance Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 49 - 0.
